entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
